00054 clogger * clogger::alloc() {
00055     return new cdaemonlog();
00056 }
00057 
00061 cdaemonlog::cdaemonlog() {
00062     int curdirfd = open(".",O_RDONLY);
00063     if(curdirfd==-1) 
00064             throw runtime_error((string)"cdaemonlog: open: "+conf_home
00065                     +": "+strerror(errno));
00066     if(chdir((conf_home+"/sockets").c_str()))
00067             throw runtime_error((string)"cdaemonlog: chdir: "
00068                     +conf_home+"/sockets: "+strerror(errno));
00069     if( (cso=socket(AF_UNIX,SOCK_STREAM,0)) == -1 )
00070             throw runtime_error((string)"cdaemonlog: socket: "+strerror(errno));
00071     cun.sun_family = AF_UNIX;
00072     strcpy(cun.sun_path, "daemonlog");
00073     if(connect(cso, (struct sockaddr*) &cun, SUN_LEN(&cun)))
00074             throw runtime_error((string)"cdaemonlog: connect: daemonauth: "+strerror(errno));
00075     if( fchdir(curdirfd) )
00076             throw runtime_error((string)"cdaemonlog: fchdir: "+conf_home
00077                     +": "+strerror(errno));
00078 }
00079 
00080 cdaemonlog::~cdaemonlog() {
00081     close(cso);
00082 }
00083 
00087 uint8_t cdaemonlog::write( result res, const string &msg ) {
00088     try {
00089             cmd = cmd_write;
00090             if( fdwrite(cso, &cmd, sizeof(cmd)) == sizeof(cmd)
00091                 && fdwrstr(cso, dom) != -1
00092                 && fdwrstr(cso, log) != -1
00093                 && fdwrite(cso, &ser, sizeof(ser)) != -1
00094                 && fdwrite(cso, &res, sizeof(res)) != -1
00095                 && fdwrstr(cso, ip) != -1
00096                 && fdwrstr(cso, msg) != -1
00097                 && fdread(cso, &resp, sizeof(resp)) == sizeof(resp)
00098                 && resp == 'K' ) return lr(err_no);
00099     } catch(...) {
00100     }
00101     return lr(err_temp);
00102 }

00109 uint8_t cdaemonlog::log_read_dom_log( vector<entry_type> & hist, size_type start, 
00110         size_type cnt ) {
00111     cmd = cmd_log_read_dom_log;
00112     return read_common(hist, start, cnt);
00113 }

00120 uint8_t cdaemonlog::dom_log_read_log( vector<entry_type> & hist, size_type start, 
00121         size_type cnt ) {
00122     cmd = cmd_dom_log_read_log;
00123     return read_common(hist, start, cnt);
00124 }
00125 
00131 uint8_t cdaemonlog::read_common( vector<entry_type> & hist, size_type start, 
00132         size_type cnt ) {
00133     if( fdwrite(cso, &cmd, sizeof(cmd)) == sizeof(cmd)
00134         && fdwrstr(cso, dom) != -1
00135         && fdwrstr(cso, log) != -1
00136         && fdwrite(cso, &start, sizeof(start)) != -1
00137         && fdwrite(cso, &cnt, sizeof(cnt)) != -1
00138         && fdread(cso, &resp, sizeof(resp)) != -1 ) {
00139             hist.clear();
00140             
00141             switch(resp) {
00142             case 'E': return lr(err_temp);
00143             case 'Z': return lr(err_empty);
00144             }
00145 
00146             uint32_t hcnt;
00147             if( fdread(cso, &hcnt, sizeof(hcnt)) == -1 ) return lr(err_rd);
00148             if( hcnt-- ) {
00149                     entry_type ent;
00150                     do {
00151                             if( fdrdstr(cso, ent.id) == -1 
00152                                 || fdread(cso, &ent.ser, sizeof(ent.ser)) == -1 
00153                                 || fdread(cso, &ent.res, sizeof(ent.res)) == -1
00154                                 || fdrdstr(cso, ent.ip) == -1 
00155                                 || fdrdstr(cso, ent.msg) == -1
00156                                 || fdrdstr(cso, ent.time) == -1 )
00157                                     return lr(err_rd);
00158                             hist.push_back(ent);
00159                     } while( hcnt -- );
00160             }
00161             return lr(err_no);
00162     }
00163     return lr(err_wr);
00164 }
00165 
00169 uint8_t cdaemonlog::log_cnt_dom_log( size_type & cnt ) {
00170     cmd = cmd_log_cnt_dom_log;
00171     return cnt_common(cnt);
00172 }
00173 
00177 uint8_t cdaemonlog::dom_log_cnt_log( size_type & cnt ) {
00178     cmd = cmd_dom_log_cnt_log;
00179     return cnt_common(cnt);
00180 }
00181 
00184 uint8_t cdaemonlog::cnt_common( size_type &cnt ) {
00185     if( fdwrite(cso, &cmd, sizeof(cmd)) == sizeof(cmd)
00186         && fdwrstr(cso, dom) != -1
00187         && fdwrstr(cso, log) != -1
00188         && fdread(cso, &resp, sizeof(resp)) != -1
00189         && 'F' == resp ) {
00190             
00191             if( fdread(cso, &cnt, sizeof(cnt)) == -1 ) return lr(err_rd);
00192             return lr(err_no);
00193     }
00194     return lr(resp == 'E' ? err_temp : err_wr);
00195 }
